verses.verse: SHa'ul <WG3972>, an emissary <WG652> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> by <WG2596> the Mitzvah <WG2003> of 'Elohim <WG2316> our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990>, and <WG2532> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, which <WG3588> is our <WG2257> hope <WG1680>;

Unto Timothy <WG5095>, my own <WG1103> son <WG5043> in <WG1722> the faith <WG4102>: Grace <WG5485>, mercy <WG1656>, and peace <WG1515>, from <WG575> 'Elohim <WG2316> our <WG2257> Father <WG3962> and <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> our <WG2257> YY <WG2962>.

As <WG2531> I besought <WG3870> <WG5656> thee <WG4571> to abide still <WG4357> <WG5658> at <WG1722> Ephesus <WG2181>, when I went <WG4198> <WG5740> into <WG1519> Macedonia <WG3109>, that <WG2443> thou mightest charge <WG3853> <WG5661> some <WG5100> that they teach <WG2085> no <WG3361> other doctrine <WG2085> <WG5721>,

Neither <WG3366> give heed <WG4337> <WG5721> to fables <WG3454> and <WG2532> endless <WG562> genealogies <WG1076>, which <WG3748> minister <WG3930> <WG5719> questions <WG2214>, rather <WG3123> than <WG2228> godly <WG2316> edifying <WG3620> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> faith <WG4102>: so do.

Now <WG1161> the end <WG5056> of the Mitzvah <WG3852> is <WG2076> <WG5748> charity <WG26> out of <WG1537> a pure <WG2513> heart <WG2588>, and <WG2532> of a good <WG18> conscience <WG4893>, and <WG2532> of faith <WG4102> unfeigned <WG505>:
From which <WG3739> some <WG5100> having swerved <WG795> <WG5660> have turned aside <WG1624> <WG5648> unto <WG1519> vain jangling <WG3150>;

Desiring <WG2309> <WG5723> to be <WG1511> <WG5750> teachers of the Torah <WG3547>; <WG3361> understanding <WG3539> <WG5723> neither <WG3383> what <WG3739> they say <WG3004> <WG5719>, nor <WG3383> whereof <WG4012> <WG5101> they affirm <WG1226> <WG5736>.
But <WG1161> we know <WG1492> <WG5758> that <WG3754> the Torah <WG3551> is good <WG2570>, if <WG1437> a man <WG5100> use <WG5530> <WG5741> it <WG846> Torahfully <WG3545>;

Knowing <WG1492> <WG5761> this <WG5124>, that <WG3754> the Torah <WG3551> is <WG2749> not <WG3756> made <WG2749> <WG5736> for a righteous man <WG1342>, but <WG1161> for the Torahless <WG459> and <WG2532> dis`Ovedient <WG506>, for the ungodly <WG765> and <WG2532> for sinners <WG268>, for unholy <WG462> and <WG2532> profane <WG952>, for murderers of fathers <WG3964> and <WG2532> murderers of mothers <WG3389>, for manslayers <WG409>,

For whoremongers <WG4205>, for them that defile themselves with mankind <WG733>, for menstealers <WG405>, for liars <WG5583>, for perjured persons <WG1965>, and <WG2532> if there be any <WG1536> other thing <WG2087> that is contrary <WG480> <WG5736> to sound <WG5198> <WG5723> doctrine <WG1319>;
According <WG2596> to the glorious <WG1391> gospel <WG2098> of the blessed <WG3107> 'Elohim <WG2316>, which <WG3739> was committed to <WG4100> my <WG1473> trust <WG4100> <WG5681>.

And <WG2532> I thank <WG2192> <WG5719> <WG5485> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> our <WG2257> YY <WG2962>, who <WG3588> hath enabled <WG1743> <WG5660> me <WG3165>, for <WG3754> that he counted <WG2233> <WG5662> me <WG3165> faithful <WG4103>, putting me <WG5087> <WG5642> into <WG1519> the ministry <WG1248>;

Who <WG3588> was <WG5607> <WG5752> before <WG4386> a blasphemer <WG989>, and <WG2532> a persecutor <WG1376>, and <WG2532> injurious <WG5197>: but <WG235> I obtained mercy <WG1653> <WG5681>, because <WG3754> I did <WG4160> <WG5656> it ignorantly <WG50> <WG5723> in <WG1722> unbelief <WG570>.

And <WG1161> the grace <WG5485> of our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> was exceeding abundant <WG5250> <WG5656> with <WG3326> faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> love <WG26> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>.

This is a faithful <WG4103> saying <WG3056>, and <WG2532> worthy <WG514> of all <WG3956> acceptation <WG594>, that <WG3754> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> came <WG2064> <WG5627> into <WG1519> the world <WG2889> to save <WG4982> <WG5658> sinners <WG268>; of whom <WG3739> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> <WG5748> chief <WG4413>.

Howbeit <WG235> for this <WG5124> cause <WG1223> I obtained mercy <WG1653> <WG5681>, that <WG2443> in <WG1722> me <WG1698> first <WG4413> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> might shew forth <WG1731> <WG5672> all <WG3956> longsuffering <WG3115>, for <WG4314> a pattern <WG5296> to them which should hereafter <WG3195> <WG5723> believe <WG4100> <WG5721> on <WG1909> him <WG846> to <WG1519> life <WG2222> everlasting <WG166>.

Now <WG1161> unto the King <WG935> eternal <WG165>, immortal <WG862>, invisible <WG517>, the only <WG3441> wise <WG4680> 'Elohim <WG2316>, be honour <WG5092> and <WG2532> glory <WG1391> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>. Amen <WG281>.

This <WG5026> charge <WG3852> I commit <WG3908> <WG5731> unto thee <WG4671>, son <WG5043> Timothy <WG5095>, according to <WG2596> the prophecies <WG4394> which went before <WG4254> <WG5723> on <WG1909> thee <WG4571>, that <WG2443> thou <WG4754> by <WG1722> them <WG846> mightest war <WG4754> <WG5735> a good <WG2570> warfare <WG4752>;

Holding <WG2192> <WG5723> faith <WG4102>, and <WG2532> a good <WG18> conscience <WG4893>; which <WG3739> some <WG5100> having put away <WG683> <WG5666> concerning <WG4012> faith <WG4102> have made shipwreck <WG3489> <WG5656>:

Of whom <WG3739> is <WG2076> <WG5748> Hymenaeus <WG5211> and <WG2532> Alexander <WG223>; whom <WG3739> I have delivered <WG3860> <WG5656> unto Satan <WG4567>, that <WG2443> they may learn <WG3811> <WG5686> not <WG3361> to blaspheme <WG987> <WG5721>.
